mapper.select: select ssa.id, ssa.spu_id, ssa.sale_attr_name, ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id as sale_attr_value_id, ssav.sale_attr_value_name from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id where ssa.is_deleted = 0 and ssav.is_deleted = 0 and ssa.spu_id = #{spuId}

select ssa.id, ssa.spu_id, ssa.sale_attr_name, ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id as sale_attr_value_id, ssav.sale_attr_value_name, sksav.id as sku_sale_attr_value_id, sksav.sku_id, if(sksav.sku_id is null, 0, 1) as is_checked from spu_sale_attr ssa inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id and ssa.base_sale_attr_id = ssav.base_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value sksav on sksav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id and sksav.sku_id = #{skuId} where ssa.is_deleted = 0 and ssav.is_deleted = 0 and ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} order by ssa.base_sale_attr_id, ssav.id
